text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the official Iraqi press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- The Indian-Iraqi friendship society grants President Saddam Hussein man of the decade award.
- Deputy Prime Minister Tareq Aziz meets in Beijing with Chinese president.
- (Leader of the Patriotic Union of Kurdistan) Jalal Talabani loots food rations.
- Iraqi Defence Minister General Sultan Hashim Ahmed lays a wreath on tomb of former defence minister the late general Adnan Kharaillah.
(The above were also carried by QADISSIYA and JUMHOURIYA)
- Saddam tours part one of an exhibition of gifts presented to him on his 60th birthday anniversary.
- Turkish firms open food exhibition on Tuesday in Baghdad.
